aapplication.scene

Class Scene

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • aapplication.scene.Scene
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, javax.accessibility.Accessible, Constantes

    public class Scene
extends javax.swing.JPanel
implements java.lang.Runnable, Constantes
    Classe qui va realiser l'animation ainsi que la creation d'ecouteurs personalises permettant de mettre les valeurs a jour en temsp reels
    Author:
    Corentin Gouanvic, Ivana Bera
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
